title: With whom did Jio successfully test 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Jio tested its 5G solution with Qualcomm Radio Access Network (RAN) solution and Radisys 5G platform. The announcement says that they’ve tested Jio’s 5G NR (New Radio) implementation - so it is not clear whether they tested the End-to-End 5G (including the 5G Core) or just the radio part.
